Name: Project: WATERFALL
About the game: Welcome to the game Project: WATERFALL! Here you are the protagonist who draws lines to the heart of cute and beautiful girls in a fantasy world. Pass a lot of levels and get a hundred achievements. Have fun playing! Project: WATERFALL is a casual puzzle game whose main gameplay is to get water to the right place using simple drawing skills. Gameplay: Make your way through the many levels. To do so, you need to use simple drawing skills. The game includes many interesting levels. There is also a lot of romantic music, a lot of interesting scenes that open up as you go through the game. Game Features: Lots of levels Nice music Beautiful images in your gallery Easy gameplay
